emailTemplate.subject: Login from a new location
emailTemplate.body:
Hello,

We noticed a login to your {APP_NAME} account from a new location.

If this was you, you may disregard this email.

If this wasn't you, you should immediately change your {APP_NAME} account password to revoke access from all other locations.

Thanks,
{APP_NAME} team

emailTemplate.subject: OTP for {APP_NAME}
emailTemplate.body:
Hello,

Your one-time password is: {OTP}

If you didn't ask for the one-time password, you can ignore this email.

Thanks,
{APP_NAME} team

verificationTemplate.subject: Verify your {APP_NAME} email
verificationTemplate.body:
Hello,

Thank you for joining us at {APP_NAME}.

Click on the button below to verify your email address.

Verify

Thanks,
{APP_NAME} team

resetPasswordTemplate.subject: Reset your {APP_NAME} password
resetPasswordTemplate.body:
Hello,

Click on the button below to reset your password.

Reset password

If you didn't ask to reset your password, you can ignore this email.

Thanks,
{APP_NAME} team

confirmEmailChangeTemplate.subject: Confirm your {APP_NAME} new email address
confirmEmailChangeTemplate.body:
Hello,

Click on the button below to confirm your new email address.

Confirm new email

If you didn't ask to change your email address, you can ignore this email.

Thanks,
{APP_NAME} team

name: users

verificationTemplate.subject: Tvoje rezervace na tebe čeká
verificationTemplate.body:
Ahoj,

máš v knihovně připravenou knížku, kterou jsi si zarezervoval.

Moje rezervace


{APP_NAME}

resetPasswordTemplate.subject: Změna hesla pro {APP_NAME}
resetPasswordTemplate.body:
Ahoj,

klikni na tlačítko dole a resetuj nebo si nastav heslo!

Resetovat / nastavit heslo

Pokud nechceš resetovat heslo tak tento mail ignoruj.

Díky
{APP_NAME}

confirmEmailChangeTemplate.subject: Upozornění na vrácení knížky

Ahoj

Chci tě upozornit že tvoje výpujčka má brzy datum vrácení

Confirm new email

If you didn't ask to change your email address, you can ignore this email.

Thanks,
{APP_NAME} team

fields.name: type
values: Světová a česká literatura do konce 18. století

name: books_show
viewQuery:
WITH borrow_info AS (
  SELECT
    borrows.book AS book_id,
    COUNT(borrows.id) AS borrowed_count
  FROM borrows
  WHERE borrows.return = 0
  GROUP BY borrows.book
)
SELECT
  books.id,
  books.name AS book_name,
  json_group_array(DISTINCT authors.name) AS authors_names,
  json_group_array(DISTINCT authors.id) AS authors_ids,
  books.year AS book_year,
  books.isbn AS book_isbn,
  books.count AS book_count,
  IFNULL(books.count - borrow_info.borrowed_count, books.count) AS available_count,
  publishers.name AS publisher_name,
  publishers.id AS publisher_id,
  books.image AS book_image,
IFNULL(json_group_array(DISTINCT tags.name), '[]') AS tags_names,
IFNULL(json_group_array(DISTINCT tags.id), '[]') AS tags_ids,
IFNULL(json_group_array(DISTINCT tags.color), '[]') AS tags_colors
FROM books
LEFT JOIN json_each(books.authors) AS book_authors ON books.id = books.id
LEFT JOIN authors ON book_authors.value = authors.id
LEFT JOIN json_each(books.tags) AS book_tags ON books.id = books.id
LEFT JOIN tags ON book_tags.value = tags.id
LEFT JOIN publishers ON books.publisher = publishers.id
LEFT JOIN borrow_info ON books.id = borrow_info.book_id
GROUP BY books.id, books.name, books.year, books.isbn, books.count, publishers.name, publishers.id;

name: borrow_to_date_show
viewQuery:
SELECT
  borrows.id,
  borrows.book AS book_id,
  borrows.return AS return,
  borrows.to_date AS to_date
FROM borrows
LEFT JOIN users ON borrows.user = users.id;

name: borrows_show
viewQuery:
SELECT
  borrows.id,
  borrows.created AS borrow_created,
  borrows.updated AS borrow_updated,
  borrows.user AS user_id,
  borrows.note AS note,
  users.username AS username,
  users.email AS user_email,
  borrows.book AS book_id,
  books.name AS book_name,
  borrows.from_date AS from_date,
  borrows.to_date AS to_date,
  borrows.return AS return,
  borrows.count AS book_count,
  (julianday(borrows.to_date) - julianday('now')) AS days_remaining
  
FROM borrows
LEFT JOIN users ON borrows.user = users.id
LEFT JOIN books ON borrows.book = books.id;

name: borrows_user
viewQuery:
SELECT
  borrows.id,
  borrows.created AS borrow_created,
  borrows.user AS user_id,
  borrows.from_date AS from_date,
  borrows.to_date AS to_date,
  borrows.return AS return,
  borrows.count AS book_count,
  (julianday(borrows.to_date) - julianday('now')) AS days_remaining,
  borrows.book AS book_id,
  
  books.name AS book_name,
  books.year AS book_year,
  publishers.name AS book_publisher_name,
  books.image AS book_image,
  
  json_group_array(DISTINCT authors.name) AS book_authors_names,
  json_group_array(DISTINCT authors.id) AS book_authors_ids

FROM borrows
LEFT JOIN users ON borrows.user = users.id
LEFT JOIN books ON borrows.book = books.id
LEFT JOIN publishers ON books.publisher = publishers.id

-- Rozbalení pole authors až PO spojení s books
LEFT JOIN json_each(books.authors) AS book_authors ON TRUE
LEFT JOIN authors ON authors.id = book_authors.value

GROUP BY borrows.id;

name: requirements_show
viewQuery:
SELECT
  requirements.id,
  requirements.created AS created,
  requirements.request AS request,
  requirements.note AS note,
  requirements.done AS done,
  requirements.link AS link,
  requirements.user AS user_id,
  users.username AS username,
  users.email AS user_email
FROM requirements
LEFT JOIN users ON requirements.user = users.id;

name: reservations_show
viewQuery:
SELECT
  reservations.id,
  reservations.created AS created,
  reservations.book AS book,
  reservations.active AS active,
  reservations.ready AS ready,
  books.name AS book_name,
  reservations.user AS user,
  users.username AS username,
  users.email AS user_email
FROM reservations
LEFT JOIN users ON reservations.user = users.id
LEFT JOIN books ON reservations.book = books.id;

name: reservations_user
viewQuery:
SELECT
  reservations.id,
  reservations.created AS created,
  reservations.book AS book,
  reservations.active AS active,
  reservations.user AS user,
  
  books.name AS book_name,
  books.image AS book_image,
  books.year AS book_year,
  publishers.name AS book_publisher,
  
  json_group_array(DISTINCT authors.name) AS book_authors_names,
  json_group_array(DISTINCT authors.id) AS book_authors_ids
  
FROM reservations
LEFT JOIN users ON reservations.user = users.id
LEFT JOIN books ON reservations.book = books.id
LEFT JOIN publishers ON books.publisher = publishers.id
  
LEFT JOIN json_each(books.authors) AS book_authors ON TRUE
LEFT JOIN authors ON authors.id = book_authors.value

GROUP BY reservations.id;

name: reviews_show
viewQuery:
SELECT
  reviews.id,
  reviews.text AS text,
  users.id AS user_id,
  users.username AS username,
  reviews.rating AS rating,
  reviews.ladix AS ladix,
  reviews.title AS title,
  reviews.authors AS authors,
  reviews.approved AS approved,
  reviews.created AS created
FROM reviews
LEFT JOIN users ON reviews.author_ladix = users.id;

name: stats
viewQuery:
SELECT
    COUNT(*) as pocet_pujcek_den,
    DATE(from_date) as den,
    GROUP_CONCAT(id) as id
FROM
    borrows
GROUP BY
    DATE(from_date);

name: stats_books
viewQuery:
SELECT
  (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) as id,
  COUNT(*) AS total_books
FROM books;

name: stats_borrows
viewQuery:
SELECT
 (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) as id,
  COUNT(*) AS total_borrows,
  SUM(return = false) AS total_not_returned
FROM borrows;

name: stats_users
viewQuery:
SELECT
  (ROW_NUMBER() OVER()) as id,
  COUNT(*) AS total_users
FROM users;
